text:
I was very tired after work and noticed that your dining area was completely empty, with no customers at the time. I just needed a few minutes to sit and rest. I understand and fully respect that the seating is for customers only, and of course, if any paying customer had arrived, I would have moved immediately out of courtesy I do have manners.

However, I felt a bit disheartened when the staff asked me to leave right away. I understand they may have been following instructions, possibly because their boss was watching, as one of them mentioned. Still, I believe that a little compassion goes a long way. I also noticed an older man who looked exhausted being asked to leave, which made me feel even more uneasy.

That said, I want to acknowledge that the Malay gentleman, the Indian lady, and the Indian man on your team were all friendly and respectful in their approach. I truly appreciate their kindness it made a difference.

Thank you for your attention to this feedback. I hope it's taken in the spirit of humanity and understanding.
Sarah and Kiran did a great service! They very friendly and they assist us accordingly! Good job
Frequent customer. Consistent servings. Pleasant staff.

One of my favorite food stall in Fair Price Hub Joo Koon. Veggies are fresh, serving is worth it (amongst the other branches in west that I visited so far)and staffs are quite welcoming, I like them, very friendly. Just that, the queue is really long on peak hours (well, all stores though), but still bearable. üëç

Always good!
Excellent service by Kiran
